title: Dressing Up: Trolls, Mythology, Legends, and Christ
description: Lars and Nick touch on the phenomenon of being a 'troll' in the colloquial sense, the ways it does and doesn't intersect with the mythology of trolls, adorning oneself in anonymity, wearing stories, and how trying on mythopoetic narratives can change you and reduce the burden, if not completely eliminate the possibility of, falling prey to idolatry.
